category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_upload_files_dir
preference.preference_description: Defines the destination directory path to be used to upload the International Material Data System (IMDS) files to International Material Data System (IMDS) server. There is no default value.
